entry.title: The Ritz, 1976 - ★★½
entry.content: 🎥 The Ritz, 1976 ⭐️ ★★½ Rita Moreno is a genuinely funny film, but it doesn’t quite stand on its own, but it’s worth sitting through.🔗 https://letterboxd.com/julienpierre/film/the-ritz/ #FilmReview

entry.title: Rebecca, 1940 - ★★★★★
entry.content: 🎥 Rebecca, 1940 ⭐️ ★★★★★ Hitchcock may have insisted Rebecca isn’t a true “Hitchcock picture,” but that claim does the film a disservice. Sure, he didn’t yet have the creative freedom he’d later enjoy, but the film bears his fingerprints in🔗 https://letterboxd.com/julienpierre/film/rebecca/1/ #FilmReview
